tpk::Filter

tpk::Filter Class Reference

#include <Filter.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Null 1D filter.

A filter filters a stream input values in some fashion to generate an output value. The base filter class does no filtering and always returns the last value input.

It can be used as the base class of real filters and can be used where a filter is required but no actual filtering is desired.

All classes derived from Filter must implement the clone method so that copies of filters can be made without knowing their type.

All the methods of this class are thread safe.
